questions.title: How do you spell Yoohoo?
questions.author: slugtumblr12
questions.content: i was talking about yoohoos the other day with my frind and he said you donot know how to spell it so i said i did but i dont. how is yoohoo spelt?

answers.text: you just spelled it dummy. but my friend says in japan they call it yuhu
answers.author: yoohoovegotmail
